Hand module

class Hand.Hand(cards=[])[source]

Bases: object

Organizes all Hand related logic since this is common to all players (calculating scores, hand string representations, etc.) The hand stores attributes for the hands current score (recalculated after every hit), as well as the bust status as a boolean.

Parameters

cards ([class:Card]) – A list of card objects or [], defaults to []

Variables

  • cards – set equal to cards parameter

  • score – Integer represnting the hand’s current score

  • bust – boolean representing the hand’s current bust status

Returns

Returns a new instance of Hand

Return type

:class`Hand`

static hand_score(cards)[source]

A static method that takes in a card array and calculates a score and bust boolean for the hand.

Parameters

Returns

Returns a tuple of hand score and bust boolean

(int, boolean)

print_hand(dealer_external=False)[source]

Prints the calling player’s hand. If dealer_external is True, prints with a facedown first card. If external is False, prints all cards faceup. The default implementation sets external to False (faceup printing).

Parameters

dealer_external – A boolean of whether the hand is printed with the first card facedown (dealer hand shown to other players) defaults to False
